description: No Activity found to handle Intent. Common when starting intents for apps/features not installed on device.
commonCauses: Starting intent for app not installed
Trying to open file type with no handler
Starting activity not declared in manifest
Using implicit intent with no matching apps
Incorrect package name in explicit intent
solutions: Check if intent can be handled: resolveActivity(packageManager) != null
Provide fallback when no app found
Check for specific app before launching
Handle exception gracefully with user message
prevention: Always check if intent can be handled before starting
Use queryIntentActivities() to verify handlers exist
Test on devices with minimal apps installed
Use intent chooser for ambiguous actions
examples: try { startActivity(intent) } catch (e: ActivityNotFoundException) { Toast.makeText(this, "No app found", LENGTH_SHORT).show() }
